description:
Here at Wandro & Associates, P.C., in Des Moines, Iowa, we offer a full range of quality professional legal services in a variety of practice areas to assist you with all the important and pressing issues affecting your life, business, finances, freedom and future. Established in 1996 by top-rated litigator Steve Wandro, our law firm has more than 23 years of serving the residents and businesses of our state.

We have become one of our region's leading legal practices for those who have needs involving any of the following issues:

• Tax disputes
• Business strategies
• Civil rights
• Breaches of contract
• Administrative law
• Personal injuries and medical malpractice
• Agriculture law
• Bankruptcy and debtor-creditor law
• Wills, estate planning and probate
• Complex commercial litigation
• Criminal law
• Alternative dispute resolution, mediation and arbitration
• Class actions and multidistrict litigation
• Appeals

When you work with us, you will receive the benefit of our extensive legal knowledge and experience, and we will provide the honest, straightforward advice on which you can rely to make the best-informed decisions. Whether we're fighting for you in court or helping you resolve your matter outside the courtroom, you can count on us to always protect your rights and interests and improve the likelihood that you will achieve the favorable results you expect and deserve efficiently and cost-effectively.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned top rankings and endorsements from our peers, and our law firm has enjoyed numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients. To discuss your matter with a member of our team with no risk, you can contact Wandro & Associates, P.C., by phone, email or through the online form located on our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
